summary: The true story of General Smyslovsky and the anti-Communist 1st Russian National Army receiving shelter in Liechtenstein in 1945 and successfully resisting Soviet pressure to be returned for execution in the USSR.
cast: Malcolm McDowell|Pierre Vaneck|Jean-François Balmer|Ludmila Mikaël|Caroline Silhol|Wojciech Pszoniak|Elena Safonova|Clémentine Célarié|Patrice Alexsandre|Catherine Bidaut|Serge Renko|Annick Blancheteau|Catherine Frot|Jean de Coninck|Geneviève Mnich|Jan Jankowski|Sarah Vanikoff|Geoffrey Bateman|Gilles Treton|Andrzej Zielinski|Jacek Braciak|Jowita Budnik|Witold Holtz|Jacek Lenartowicz|Kazimierz Mazur|Cezary Morawski|Andrzej Precigs
title: Vent d'est
